_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.name: SHRD_SuggestMatch
SHRD_ProcessModelPicker
_a-0000ec44-cb49-8000-9be6-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!processModels: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    a!queryProcessAnalytics(
      report: cons!SHRD_REPORT_ALL_PM,
      query: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_query"(
        pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
          startIndex: 1,
          batchSize: 5000
        )
      )
    ).data,
    a!map(
      id: fv!item.dp0,
      uuid: fv!item.c4,
      name: fv!item.c0
    )
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pickerFieldCustom"(
    label: a!defaultValue(
      ri!label,
      "Process Model",
    ),
    required: ri!required,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    maxSelections: 1,
    suggestFunction: rule!SHRD_SuggestMatch(
      filter: _,
      labels: local!processModels.name,
      identifiers: if(
        a!defaultValue(ri!useUuidForValue, false),
        local!processModels.uuid,
        local!processModels.id
      )
    ),
    value: ri!value,
    selectedLabels: if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!value),
      null,
      displayvalue(
        ri!value,
        if(
          a!defaultValue(ri!useUuidForValue, false),
          local!processModels.uuid,
          local!processModels.id
        ),
        local!processModels.name,
        null
      )
    ),
    saveInto: {
      ri!saves
    }
  )
)

0002ee64-e4eb-8000-fb1e-7f0000014e7a.name: AIA Model Trigger Create Or Update

_a-0000ee66-4fc0-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: SHRD_UTIL_length
_a-0000ee66-4fc0-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*Gets the length of a value passed in wrapped in an array*/
length({ri!value})

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ModelTrigger_Initialize
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!match(
  value: ri!modelRecord,
  default: error("Input must be a single instance of AIA Classification Model or AIA Extraction Model"),
  /*Extraction Model*/
  whenTrue: typeof(fv!value) = typeof(recordType!AIA Extraction Model()),
  then: recordType!AIA Model Trigger(
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelId: ri!modelRecord[recordType!AIA Extraction Model.modelId],
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelType: cons!AIA_MODEL_TYPE_VALUES[1],
    /*defualt trigger type*/
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.triggerTypeId: cons!AIA_REF_TRIGGER_TYPE_ID_RECONCILE,
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.isSynchronous: false,
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.extractionModel: ri!modelRecord
  ),
  /*Classification Model*/
  whenTrue: typeof(fv!value) = typeof(recordType!AIA Classification Model()),
  then: recordType!AIA Model Trigger(
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelId: ri!modelRecord[recordType!AIA Classification Model.modelId],
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelType: cons!AIA_MODEL_TYPE_VALUES[2],
    /*defualt trigger type*/
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.triggerTypeId: cons!AIA_REF_TRIGGER_TYPE_ID_RECONCILE,
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.isSynchronous: false,
    recordType!AIA Model Trigger.classificationModel: ri!modelRecord
  )
)

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_ModelTrigger_RecordAction_CreateOrUpdate
AIA_QR_getModelTrigger
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Model Trigger,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  fields: ri!fields,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Model Trigger.uuid,
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!uuid,
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelTriggerId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!ids
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelTriggerId,
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!idsToExclude
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA Model Trigger.triggerTypeId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!triggerTypeIds
    )
  },
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AIA Model Trigger.modelTriggerId,
    ascending: true
  )
)

_a-0000ed46-3c8c-8000-9bac-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_UTIL_LoadBrandingMap

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord

_a-0000ee66-4fc0-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_Template_InfoCardWithRichTextList

_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AIA_QR_getRefTriggerType
_a-0000ee5d-151c-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!SHRD_UTIL_QueryRecord(
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  recordType: recordType!AIA REF Trigger Type,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  fields: ri!fields,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA REF Trigger Type.id,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!ids
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AIA REF Trigger Type.id,
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!idsToExclude
    )
  },
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: recordType!AIA REF Trigger Type.id,
    ascending: true
  )
)
